name: 4th World Nursing and Healthcare Congress (World Nursing 2024)
content: The Organizing Committee of 4th World Nursing and Healthcare Congress invite you to participate in the nursing congress, which will be held during May 30-31, 2024 at Rome, Italy. The main theme of conference is “Scrutinize Latest Innovations and Advances in Nursing and Healthcare”. This Conference will provide a unique opportunity for nurses, healthcare practitioners, paramedics and trauma care specialists from around the world to communicate and share innovative thoughts and practices designed to optimize patient care.
